item.source: WHat's wrong with shops and how do I add a code to send a message and give items

item.title: WHat's wrong with shops and how do I add a code to send a message and give items
item.dc:creator: @izzygoo izzygoo
item.description:
@izzygoo wrote:

  1. Make sure in your shop.cfg that the shop id your trying to open dosent have too many items.

  2. Make sure in client.class your npc id is added under Npcfirstclick (If you click talk to trade him) or Npcsecondclick (If you click trade to trade him).

  3. Yea that looks like it’s adding the items just put it under where it teleports them out of the minigame.

  4. No you don’t add it under //Done IceMini. Thats just where he made a note (If your making a note in java for yourself like to find something or to mark the end of it you don’t have to, but it’s helpful. You do //, it dosent read anything on that side of those).

Like I said in #1 on the second paragraph (its a short paragraph lol) you add it under where it teleports you out of the Icegamemini.

Read full topic
item.source: WHat's wrong with shops and how do I add a code to send a message and give items

item.title: WHat's wrong with shops and how do I add a code to send a message and give items
item.dc:creator: @needhoster needhoster
item.description:
@needhoster wrote:

It’s 2 questions. I added NPCs to my autospawn.cfg and when I trade them, it just gets connection lost. What’s wrong? Also, the v0id-pkz source came with the icemini but at the end it gives nothing. I need a code that says “Congratz” or watever and gives items. It might be this addItem(386, 999999999); addItem(995, 999999999); sendMessage("Congratz! Here is your reward."); } Is that right? Also, do I put it under the IceMini Global Objects since it says //Done InceMini.

Thanks

Read full topic
item.source: WHat's wrong with shops and how do I add a code to send a message and give items
